Value: pinɛ pinɛkt̪ ɛ len kʼad kɛl wakpɛʃkun

Comment_contributor: (lit: 'it finished the fingers of the hands' )

Value: huʃ kʼad kɛl wanlekan mihin apa wakpɛʃkun
huʃ kʼad kɛl wanlekan huʃ apa wakpɛʃkun
huʃ kʼad kɛl wanlekan huʃt̪ ahmɛ apa wakpɛʃkun
huʃ kʼad kɛl wanlekan pinɛ pinɛkt̪ ɛ len apa wakpɛʃkun
huʃ kʼad kɛl wanlekan inɛ kʼad kɛlan apa wakpɛʃkun

Comment_glosser: The first ‘foot’ is optional. I give the version without it as alternative glossing.

Value: mihin huʃt̪ ahmɛ pits̪ʼ kɛl wakpɛʃkun
mihin pinɛ pinɛkt̪ ɛ len pit̪sʼ kɛl wakpɛʃkun

Comment_contributor: (lit: 'it finished the fingers of the foot' )
